definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Use warm, running water, soap and a personal towel.
sentences.chinese: 使用適溫的自來水，肥皂和個人毛巾。

sentences.english: Houlihan says 25 percent of bottled waters are simply "tap water in a bottle."
sentences.chinese: 胡莉說，25%的瓶裝水就是裝在瓶子裏的自來水。

sentences.english: Ledwidge says she now drinks only filtered tap water.
sentences.chinese: 路德維奇說她現在只喝過濾後的自來水。

sentences.english: Antibacterial soaps in every bathroom. We'll be adding vancomycin to the water supply soon.
sentences.chinese: 馬上我們就要加萬古黴素在自來水裏面了。

sentences.english: Most towns are supplied with tap-water and electricity.
sentences.chinese: 大多數城鎮都有自來水和電力供應。

sentences.english: Water was spouting out from a broken watermain.
sentences.chinese: 水從破裂的自來水主管中噴出。

sentences.english: Chlorine dosing disinfection in waterworks is an important process to guarantee the quality of tap water.
sentences.chinese: 水廠加氯消毒是保證自來水品質的關鍵環節之一。

sentences.english: Most of the houses have no electricity and no running water.
sentences.chinese: 大多數房子都沒有通電，也沒有自來水。

sentences.english: The houses in this village are without water.
sentences.chinese: 這個村子裏家家戶戶都沒有自來水。

sentences.english: She turned the water off at the mains.
sentences.chinese: 她關閉了自來水的幹管。

sentences.english: The water gushed out of the tap.
Still, it has no running water and one outdoor latrine.
sentences.chinese: 但是，還沒有自來水和屋外的場院。

sentences.english: If there is no occasion to use tap water, it is necessary to select air-cooled.
sentences.chinese: 如果使用場合沒有自來水，就必須選擇風冷式。

sentences.english: The hot water heat exchanger respectively connects to tap water pipe and heat insulating water tank.
sentences.chinese: 該熱水換熱器分別與自來水管和保溫水箱連接。

sentences.english: They crowd round the tap and splash water over their faces .
sentences.chinese: 自來水龍頭邊擠滿了人，用手捧些水來澆在臉上。

sentences.english: Environmental ly, recycling of water eases the burden on the town water supply for irrigating the vines.
sentences.chinese: 水的再循環在灌溉藤的城鎮自來水上減輕負擔。

definition: fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
to generate electricity/to send a telegram
